trans-unit.source: The field %field% is limited to %limit% characters
trans-unit.target: 该字段 %field% 字数最大限为%limit% 个字符

trans-unit.source: Your firstname contains some invalid characters
trans-unit.target: 你的名字包含一些无效的字符

trans-unit.source: Your lastname contains some invalid characters
trans-unit.target: 你的姓包含一些无效的字符

trans-unit.source: The password is incorrect (must be alphanumeric string with at least 8 characters)
trans-unit.target: 密码不正确 (必须至少是8个字符的字母顺序字符串)

trans-unit.source: The password is incorrect (must be Strong)
trans-unit.target: 密码不正确(必须是强密码)

trans-unit.source: The password and its confirmation are different

trans-unit.target: 此电子邮件地址是无效的。

trans-unit.note: Line: 306 Comment: We fill the process step used for Ajax queries

trans-unit.source: PHP %version% or later is not enabled
trans-unit.target: PHP %version% 或更高版本未启用

trans-unit.source: Cannot create new files and folders
trans-unit.target: 无法创建新文件和文件夹

trans-unit.source: PHP OpenSSL extension is not loaded
trans-unit.target: PHP OpenSSL 扩展名未加载

trans-unit.source: PDO MySQL extension is not loaded
PHP's config "memory_limit" must be to a minimum of 256M
Not all files were successfully uploaded on your server
trans-unit.target: 不是全部文件上载到了您的服务器

trans-unit.source: Recursive write permissions for %user% user on %folder%
trans-unit.target: 用户 %user% 对 %folder% 必须取得写权限
用户 %user% 对 %folder% 必须取得书写权限

trans-unit.source: Cannot open external URLs (requires allow_url_fopen as On)
trans-unit.target: 无法打开外部URLs (要求允许url_fopen 为On)

trans-unit.source: Help us learn more about your store so we can offer you optimal guidance and the best features for your business!
trans-unit.target: 帮助我们更多地了解你的店铺，我们可以为您的企业提供最佳的指导和最合适的功能！

trans-unit.source: This email address will be your username to access your store's back office.
trans-unit.target: 这个电子邮件地址将成为您的用户名来访问您的店铺后台。

trans-unit.source: Enter a password between %d and %d characters
trans-unit.target: 输入 %d 个到 %d 个字符之间的密码

trans-unit.source: Demo products are a good way to learn how to use PrestaShop. You should install them if you are not familiar with it.
trans-unit.target: 演示商品是个了解如何使用 Prestashop 好方法。如果您还不熟悉如何在 PrestaShop 上开店，您应该安装它们。

trans-unit.source: If you are using PrestaShop for the first time, you should install all modules now and uninstall the ones you don't need later.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是第一次使用PrestaShop，您应该现在安装所有模块，并在以后卸载不需要的模块。

trans-unit.source: Configure your database by filling out the following fields
trans-unit.target: 填写以下字段配置数据库

trans-unit.source: To use PrestaShop, you must create a database to collect all of your store's data-related activities.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 PrestaShop，您必须 创建一个数据库来收集您商店的所有数据相关活动。

trans-unit.source: Please complete the fields below in order for PrestaShop to connect to your database.
trans-unit.target: 请按顺序填写下面的字段，以便 Prestashop 连接到您的数据库。

trans-unit.source: The default port is 3306. To use a different port, add the port number at the end of your server's address i.e ":4242".
trans-unit.target: 默认端口为3306。如要使用不同的端口，请在服务器的地址端口末端添加“：4242”。
现在测试你的数据库连接吧！

trans-unit.source: To install PrestaShop, you need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser.
trans-unit.target: 您需要在浏览器中启用 JavaScript 来安装 PrestaShop。

trans-unit.source: To enjoy the many features that are offered for free by PrestaShop, please read the license terms below. PrestaShop core is licensed under OSL 3.0, while the modules and themes are licensed under AFL 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 想要享受 PrestaShop 提供的多种免费功能，请阅读下面的许可条款。Prestashop 核心是以 OSL 3.0协议 授权，但是模块和主题授权于 AFL3.0 协议。

trans-unit.source: I agree to the above terms and conditions.
trans-unit.target: 我同意上述条款和条件。
在安装的过程中出现了错误...

trans-unit.source: You can use the links on the left column to go back to the previous steps, or restart the installation process by clicking here.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用左侧列中的链接返回到前面的步骤，或者通过点击这里重新启动安装​​过程。

trans-unit.source: You have just finished installing your shop. Thank you for using PrestaShop!
trans-unit.target: 您已完成店铺的安装。感谢您使用 PrestaShop！

trans-unit.source: For security purposes, you must delete the "install" folder.
trans-unit.target: 为了保证安全，你必须删除文件夹 “安装” 。

trans-unit.source: Manage your store using your Back Office. Manage your orders and customers, add modules, change themes, etc.
trans-unit.target: 使用后台管理您的店铺。管理您的订单和客户，添加模块，更改主题等。

trans-unit.source: Discover your store as your future customers will see it!
trans-unit.target: 站在顾客的位置上看您的店铺！

trans-unit.source: We are currently checking PrestaShop compatibility with your system environment
trans-unit.target: 我们正在检查您和 PrestaShop 的系统环境兼容

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop compatibility with your system environment has been verified!
trans-unit.target: 您和 PrestaShop 的系统环境兼容已通过验证！

trans-unit.source: Oops! Please correct the item(s) below, and then click "%refresh_label%" to test the compatibility of your new system.
trans-unit.target: 糟糕！ 请更正以下项目，然后单击“%refresh_label%”以测试新系统的兼容性。

trans-unit.source:
Warning: You cannot use this tool to upgrade your store anymore.

You already have PrestaShop version %version% installed.

If you want to upgrade to the latest version, please use the 1-Click Upgrade module and follow its instructions.
trans-unit.target:
警告：您不能再使用此工具升级您的商店。

您已经安装了 PrestaShop 版本 %version%.

如果您想升级到最新版本，请使用一键升级模块并按照其说明进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Installing PrestaShop is quick and easy. In just a few moments, you will become part of a community consisting of more than %numMerchants% merchants. You are on the way to creating your own unique online store that you can manage easily every day.
trans-unit.target: 安装 PrestaShop 既快速又简单。 在短短的几分钟内，您将成为由超过 %numMerchants% 商家组成的社区的一部分。 您正在创建自己独特的在线商店，每天都可以轻松管理。

trans-unit.source: The language selection above only applies to the Installation Assistant. Once your store is installed, you can choose the language of your store from over %d% translations, all for free!
trans-unit.target: 上面语言选择仅用于安装助手。一旦店铺安装完毕，你可以从超过 %d 个翻译版本里选择您的商店需要的语言，这一切都是免费的！

trans-unit.source: Please activate the 'mod_auth_basic' Apache module to allow the use of the PrestaShop webservice.
trans-unit.target: 请激活‘mod_auth_Basic’ Apache模块以允许使用PrestaShop Web服务。

trans-unit.source: We could not check to see if basic authentication and rewrite extensions have been activated. Please manually check if they've been activated in order to use the PrestaShop webservice.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以不检查基本身份验证和激活重写扩展。请手动检查他们是否被激活使用的Prestashop Web服务。

trans-unit.source: Please activate the 'SimpleXML' PHP extension to allow testing of PrestaShop's webservice.
trans-unit.target: 请激活'的SimpleXML“PHP扩展，允许的Prestashop的web服务的测试。

trans-unit.source: It is preferable to use SSL (https:) for webservice calls, as it avoids the "man in the middle" type security issues.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话，最好使用SSL（HTTPS）的WebService调用，因为它避免 "man in the middle"的安全问题”。
-- 请选择您主要经营项目 --

trans-unit.source: You must enter a database name
trans-unit.target: 您必须输入一个数据库名

trans-unit.source: You must enter a database login
trans-unit.target: 您必须输入一个数据库登录名

trans-unit.source: Cannot convert database data to utf-8
trans-unit.target: 无法将数据转换成 utf-8

trans-unit.source: At least one table with same prefix was already found, please change your prefix or drop your database
trans-unit.target: 如果找到相同前缀的数据库表，请更换前缀或者删除您的数据库表。

trans-unit.source: Your database login does not have the privileges to create table on the database "%s". Ask your hosting provider:
trans-unit.target: 你的数据库登陆没有特权来在数据库%s里创建表格。请询问你的主机供应商。

trans-unit.source: You must be granted the privilege to select data in the tables of database "%s". Ask your hosting provider to enable it.
trans-unit.target: 您必须被授予在数据库"%s"的表中选择数据的权限。 要求您的托管服务提供商启用它。

trans-unit.source: Database Server is not found. Please verify the login, password and server fields
trans-unit.target: 数据库服务器没有找到。请检查登录名，密码和服务器领域

trans-unit.source: Connection to MySQL server succeeded, but database "%database%" not found
trans-unit.target: 成功连接到MySQL服务器，但"%database%"数据库未找到

trans-unit.source: Attempt to create the database automatically

trans-unit.target: 无法书写 app/config/parameters.php 文件
无法书写 app/config/parameters.yml 文件
未找到数据库文件结构

trans-unit.source: File "language.xml" not found for language iso "%iso%"
trans-unit.target: 无法找到语言iso "%iso%" 需要的文件"language.xml"

trans-unit.source: File "language.xml" not valid for language iso "%iso%"
trans-unit.target: 文件 "language.xml" 在语言 iso "%iso%" 里无效

trans-unit.source: Cannot execute post install on module "%module%"
trans-unit.target: 无法在模块"%module%"上执行安装后配置

trans-unit.source: An SQL error occurred for entity %entity%: %message%
trans-unit.target: 实体发生 SQL 错误 %entity%: %message%
不能为实体"%entity%" 创建图片"%identifier%"

trans-unit.source: Cannot create image "%identifier%" (bad permissions on folder "%folder%")
trans-unit.target: 无法创建图片 "%identifier%" ( 无文件夹"%folder%"授权)
